settings.heading: Details
settings.content:
• Buildable & Poseable
  • Authentic Character Details
  • Genuine License Limited Edition
  • Popular Heroes & Monsters And Durable Construction
  • Perfect Collector's Size

Unleash the Giants of Light! This isn't your average collectible set. Each figure is a building experience, with approximately 21 blocks and 14 points of articulation for maximum poseability. Build, pose, and recreate epic battles with your favorite Ultraman heroes (and monsters!). Collect all 9, plus the unique figure.

settings.heading: Shopping Tips
settings.content:
Complete Set Purchase: Each suprise figurine in the set is unique, ensuring a diverse collection without duplicates.

Single Suprise Purchase: Purchasing suprise figurines individually may result in receiving duplicate figures.

settings.heading: Shipping Terms
settings.content:
Orders in stock are usually shipped within the United State within 2-7 business days. A shipping confirmation email will be sent to the email address attached to the order once the order has shipped. 

Please Note: International shipping is not currently available.

settings.heading: Product Care
settings.content:
Suprise Rules:

  1. For individuals aged 9 and above, please purchase suprise products under the supervision of a guardian. Kids under the age of 9 are not advised to make purchases.
  2. The packaging for these products contains small parts; do not swallow them, and do not allow kids under 3 years of age to use these toys.
  3. Suprise products are unique and random. Once opened, they cannot be returned or exchanged.

settings.heading: Return
settings.content:
You can return your Blokees order within 30 days of receipt. Please make sure the collectibles you received are in unused condition with the tags and packaging intact. If you've opened the toy it can not be returned. Start your return by emailing us at service@blokees.com.. Upon receiving and inspecting your item, a refund will be processed within 10 business days according to the original method of payment.

Please Note:

  1. Custom items, sale goods, and gift cards are non-returnable.
  2. Blokees only supports company products sold from authorized sellers in the US and the company websites.

settings.heading: Help Center
settings.content: To contact Blokees' customer service department, please email service@blokees.com or fill out the form on the contact page.

settings.heading: Packaging Contents
settings.content:
Suprise Set Box Composition: 9 Ultraman Blokees Figures (may have one special figure)

  • Ultraman Figure x 9
  • Weapon Accessory / Poseable Gesture (depends on the Figures)
  • Display Stand x 9
  • Instruction Manual x 9

settings.text: With 1500w ebike conversion kit, Its affordability, and versatility, You can turn the bike you love electric at a fraction of the cost of an eBike, for all your all-terrain adventures.

settings.icon_2_text: Package Size: 72*72*120 mm (Single Box), 220*220*125 mm (Set Box)

settings.heading: Detail
settings.content:
Dive into the Transformers universe with Blokees Figures Galaxy Version 05 ONE! This collection brings the origins story to life with 9 iconic characters from the "Transformers: One" movie. Each figure features an impressive 20+ points of articulation, allowing for incredibly dynamic poses and endless play possibilities.

What makes this set truly special? First, the surprise factor - hunt for the rare metallic Optimus Prime, hidden at a 1:36 ratio! Plus, each character comes with interchangeable accessories and weapons, letting you customize your display or battle scenes.

We're constantly improving playability, with new features added in each iteration. Whether you're recreating movie moments or imagining new adventures, these highly detailed figures offer both hardcore fans and newcomers an exciting way to experience the birth of the Autobot-Decepticon conflict.

settings.block_text: Every box contains one of the ultra-rare secret figures, making each unboxing a thrilling surprise! Collect them all! (1/27 rarity)
These aren't just static figures. With ~21 building blocks and 14 points of articulation, you can pose your Ultraman heroes and monsters in dynamic action stances.
Authentic Ultraman figures with incredible detail, capturing the iconic designs from the Ultraman Galaxy Version.
Explore a wide range of iconic Ultraman characters and monsters, satisfying every collector's desire.

settings.heading: Ultraman Galaxy Blokees: The Ultimate Collector's Set!
settings.text: Get 9 awesome Ultraman figures in every box, including heroes, monsters, and a chance at the secret figure. Build, display, and complete your collection!

settings.title: Ultraman vs. Monsters:  Epic Battles Await
settings.sub_title: Snap Together Awesomeness - Summon Heroes with a Click!
settings.left_richtext_unit1:
• Solid color and transparent ABS plastic
  • Dual-injection molding for authentic translucent eye effect
  • Illuminated version features light-up eyes
settings.right_richtext_unit1:
• Transparent ABS chest armor
  • Detailed paint application and silk-screen printing
settings.richtext_unit2:
• Single-piece ABS/POM dual-injection molding
  • Two-stage articulation in limbs
  • Unidirectional assembly for improved building experience
settings.left_richtext_unit3:
• Uses a "bodysuit neck collar design"
  • Head and tail can be detached separately
settings.right_richtext_unit3: • Can be disassembled into individual parts like claws and limbs

settings.block_text: Genuine licensed figures with a limited production run.
Chance to discover a rare secret figure with a 1/27 ratio.
Includes fan-favorites like Ultraman Tiga, Zero, Gaia, and more, plus monster figures.
Snap-together figures with 21 pieces and 14 points of articulation.
Select figures have light-up eyes and chests for added excitement.
Authentic character details and high-quality ABS/POM materials make these figures stand out.
Compatible pieces allow for custom creations and epic battle scenes between heroes and monsters.
Designed at 50x95mm, Perfect for trendy  surprise box displays, Includes base, signed character card, and storage box.

settings.heading: Ultraman Blockees: Collect & Illuminate
settings.text: Collect, pose, and showcase your Ultraman Galaxy with ease!

settings.content_text: Been collecting since launch. Five boxes total. Paint apps are clean, no factory defects. Just wish they'd include more effect parts. Still hunting for that secret figure!
Bought for my classroom reward bin. Students enjoy building them during break. Parts don't get lost easily, and the finished figures are pretty durable. Good for ages 9+.
Got all main characters from one box. Build time is quick, maybe 15 mins each. The detail on Belial and Gomora is spot-on. Already pre-ordered next series.
Fourth box this month. Build quality is amazing - my kid hasn't broken any yet. Got the secret Tiga! Love how the joints stay tight after posing. The transparent chest pieces look great on display.
Two boxes in. Nice compact size for my cubicle display. No rare pulls yet but the regular figures look clean. The stands are sturdy - figures haven't fallen once during meetings.
First time trying these. Instructions are clear, pieces snap together well. Bit pricey but better quality than cheaper brands. The 14 points of articulation really make a difference.

settings.video_title_youtube: The Transformers of Fractured Space-Time?! Blokees Galaxy Version 04 Unboxings

settings.video_title_host: The Transformers of Fractured Space-Time?! Blokees Galaxy Version 04 Unboxings

settings.content_text: Got this for my nephew's birthday. He built all 9 in one day! The transparent parts and color matching are really nice. Good alternative to screen time. Will buy again for Christmas.

settings.rich_text: Includes stand and storage box for effortless showcasing

• 50x95mm
  • The perfect display size for trendy surprise box collectibles

• 21 interlocking pieces
  • 14 points of articulation
  • Flexible joints for dynamic posing

settings.title: Battle Mode: Activate! Unleash  Ultimate Moves!
settings.sub_title: Recreate Classic Combat StancesPose your heroes just like in the show!

settings.heading: Ultraman Showdown: Hero & Monster Blokees
settings.context: Mix and match parts to create epic battles

settings.block_title: What characters are included in the Ultraman Galaxy Giants of Light set?
settings.block_text: Each set box contains 9 Ultraman Blokees figures. The set includes a variety of popular heroes and monsters from the Ultraman Galaxy series, such as Ultraman Tiga (Multi Type and Power Type), Ultraman Zero, Luna Miracle Zero, Ultraman Gaia V2, Ultraman Geed Primitive, Ultraman Belial, Gomora, and Alien Baltan.  There's also a chance to find a secret rare figure (1/27 rarity) in every box!

These figures are buildable and highly poseable.  With approximately 21 building blocks and 14 points of articulation, you can create dynamic action poses. They are officially licensed and highly detailed, made with high-quality ABS/POM materials.

settings.block_title: Are these figures safe for children?
settings.block_text: These figures are recommended for ages 9 and up. For children under 9, adult supervision is strongly recommended. The packaging contains small parts which are a choking hazard for children under 3. Please ensure children do not put the pieces in their mouths.

settings.block_title: What comes in each set box?
settings.block_text:
Each "Surprise Set Box" contains:
  - 9 Ultraman Figures (with a chance of one being the secret rare figure)
  - Weapon Accessory / Poseable Gesture (depending on the figure)
  - 9 Display Stands
  - 9 Instruction Manuals

settings.block_title: What is the size of the figures and the box?
settings.block_text: The figures are designed at 50x95mm, perfect for display.  The package size (set box) is 220x220x110mm.

settings.block_title: What is the rarity of the secret figure?
settings.block_text: The secret figure has a rarity of 1/27. This means for every 27 figures produced, there is one secret figure.

settings.block_title: Can I return or exchange a surprise box after opening it?
settings.block_text: Due to the unique and random nature of the surprise box, returns or exchanges are not accepted once the box has been opened.  This policy is in place to maintain the integrity of the surprise box experience for all collectors.

settings.block_title: When will single Ultraman figures figures be sold separately?
settings.block_text: Currently, we offer the 9-figure Surprise Set Box. We're exploring different options for future releases and will announce any updates as soon as we can. Stay tuned for Blokees!
